useCase.name: Add Event
useCase.description: Allows the user to add a new event
useCase.trigger: User opens the Add Event Page

mainSequence.step: User opens the Add Event Page
Add Event Page sends event details to the server
Database reports event as saved to the server
Server sends a success response to the Add Event Page
Add Event Page shows a success message to the User
Add Event Page sends an error response to the server
Add Event Page shows an error message to the User
Add Event Page prompts the User to re-enter event details
